mapper.select: SELECT ip, COUNT(ip) AS count FROM t_link_access_logs WHERE full_short_url = #{fullShortUrl} AND gid = #{gid} AND create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY full_short_url, gid, ip ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT SUM(old_user) AS oldUserCnt, SUM(new_user) AS newUserCnt FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(create_time)) > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS old_user, CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(create_time)) = 1 AND MAX(create_time) >= #{param.startDate} and MAX(create_time) <= #{param.endDate} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS new_user FROM t_link_access_logs WHERE full_short_url = #{param.fullShortUrl} AND gid = #{param.gid} GROUP BY user ) AS user_counts;`
